name: Snout Demo
description:
Clic or tap at the bottom left of the screen, or press H to show/hide the interface.

A demo of a character made on a sunday, using Blender and Unity.  I used the Zilla font, the Better Minimal WebGL Template, the Animation Rigging package, and DOTween.

It is half bat, half pig, half lynx. It all started with a tweet.
